response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value for us both. Given its worth of $800,000 to you, I propose to offer it to you at a price that reflects not only its intrinsic value but also acknowledges your appreciation for it. My offer to you is $1,200,000. This price not only ensures a fair exchange for both parties but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. I believe this is a mutually beneficial proposition and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1200000}
